summary: In the mist of a violent gang war, a series of unfortunate events threatens the fate of a powerful triad leader and his empire.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Simon Yam|Tien Niu|Danny Lee|Jing Wu|Eddie Cheung|Maggie Siu|Suet Lam|Ken Lo|Jacky Heung|Pinky Cheung|Shiu Hung Hui|Jay Lau|Zhanwen Kou|Sze-Ming Lu|Hark-On Fung|Carisa Yan|Tung So|Jeffrey Wan-Chung Lam|Hak-Shing Keung|Wah Cheung|Hin-Wai Au|Chuen Sing Lee|Fanny Wong|Tian-Lin Wang|Bing-Man Tam|Chung Chow|Tak-Bun Wong|Danny Arroyo|Siu-Ming Lui|So-Foon Wong|Anthony Carpio|Tat-Kwong Chan|Jeffrey Chow|Woon-Ling Hau|Wong Yin Keung|Jonathan Yat-Sing Lee|Wah-Wo Wong|Courtney Wu
keywords: weapon|police station|police officer killed in police station|pistol|rifle
director: Director: Dennis Law (as Dennis S.Y. Law)
title: Duo shuai
